column_description: the unique identifier of the order line

the id of the order
Maps to cust_order(order_id)

the id of the book
Maps to book(book_id)

value_description:
commonsense evidence:
Even though the customer ordered the book with the same book id, the price could be different. The price of the order may be influenced by the shipping method, seasonal discount, and the number of books the customer ordered.
